page.title: 14KIRKCOWAN SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: Once a year we have a{Sports Day}in {Hamilton Park}when House Teams from{ {Bladnoch}and{Tarff}compete for a shield and sports championship{ {trophies.}As well as the usual flat races,skipping races and sack races we have an{obstacle race}and a{potato {gathering race.}In the obstacle race competitors go under a net,skip with a hoop,run in a sack and run on tin can stilts.In the potato gathering race potatoes as bean bags are collected up from hoops.The infant pupils have fun races called the{Monkey Race}and{Wild {Horses Race.}The{Toddlers}and{Mothers} also have a race.The sports end with the presentetion of the trophies to the winners and ice lollies to everyone.The first 3 in each race are presented with different{coloured {ribbons.}
